effects.effect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
effects.shortEffect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.

moveDescription:
Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects
itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does
not stop status moves.
